title: Wildly impressive video, feature updates for Insta360, GoPro & DJI
content:
Whether you want to capture better video, or turn your shots into better, more watchable and shareworthy clips, these updates from GoPro, Insta360, and DJI should give you an edge. From app-based 360º footage editing that’ll blow your mind, to DJI’s new ActiveTrack 5.0 “follow me” update, here’s the latest action cam updates worth a
